flawed_nl_solution:
Twice the number of participants in 2018 is 150 participants x 2 = <<150*2=3000>>3000 participants.
The number of participants in 2019 was 3000 participants + 20 participants = <<3000+20=3020>>3020 participants.
Half the number of participants in 2019 is 3020 participants /2 = <<3020/2=1510>>1510 participants.
The number of participants in 2020 was 1510 participants - 40 participants = <<1510-40=1470>>1470 participants.
There were 3020 participants - 1470 participants = <<3020-1470=1550>>1550 more participants in 2019 than in 2020.
#### 1550

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
